input.sentences: the whole family went to graduation where many speakers talked .
we could barely contain our excitement when the big moment came .
everyone had to get a picture with the person of honor .
after one last family photo the big day finally came to a close .
output.sentences: The illustrious speakers talked about life choices at the graduation ceremony.
After the speeches, the graduate could barely contain her excitement as she had her moment receiving her diploma.
Her hands shook with anticipation at the moment she moved her tassel.
She took a picture with the person whose family was named in the honor she received.
Finally, she was able take a photo with her family.
